track.name: I like the way you kiss me

album.title: I like the way you kiss me

wiki.summary: The song “I Like the Way You Kiss Me” is a blend of futuristic pop with influences from the moody 80s era, characterized by pulsating synths and a dark, retro-futuristic sound collage. Artemas brings his gloomy, crooning vocals to the chorus, creating a contrast to the track’s overall kinetic energy. The lyrics depict a narrative of a troubled relationship where the protagonist is uncertain about the status of the relationship. Ultimately Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: The song “I Like the Way You Kiss Me” is a blend of futuristic pop with influences from the moody 80s era, characterized by pulsating synths and a dark, retro-futuristic sound collage. Artemas brings his gloomy, crooning vocals to the chorus, creating a contrast to the track’s overall kinetic energy. The lyrics depict a narrative of a troubled relationship where the protagonist is uncertain about the status of the relationship. Ultimately, he admits to prioritizing physical intimacy over emotional connection by emphasizing the importance of sex in the relationship. Read more on Last.fm.
